name: server
description: gateway_port: 4000 authentication_port: 4001 posts_port: 4002 social_port: 4003 friends_port: 4004 realtime_port: 4005 database_port: 5000

scripts.start: concurrently "cd database_service && npm start" "cd gateway_service && npm start" "cd authentication_service && npm start" "cd posts_service && npm start" "cd social_service && npm start" "cd friends_service && npm start" "cd realtime_service && npm start" "cd logger_service && npm start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd database_service && npm run dev" "cd gateway_service && npm run dev" "cd authentication_service && npm run dev" "cd posts_service && npm run dev" "cd social_service && npm run dev" "cd friends_service && npm run dev" "cd realtime_service && npm run dev" "cd logger_service && npm run dev"
scripts.i: npm i concurrently && concurrently "cd database_service && npm i" "cd gateway_service && npm i" "cd authentication_service && npm i" "cd posts_service && npm i" "cd social_service && npm i" "cd friends_service && npm i" "cd realtime_service && npm i" "cd logger_service && npm i"
